    #include<iostream>
    #include<cstdio>
    #include<vector>
    #include<string>
    using namespace std;
    int a[10000500];
    int main()
    {
    int i;
    int j;
    int k;
    int l;
    int num;
    int test;
    int n;
    a[1]=1;
    a[2]=2;
    a[3]=2;
    l=4;
    num=3;
    for(i=4;l<10000000;i++)
    {
    j = a[i-1];
    for(k=1;k<=j;k++)
    {
    a[l++]=num;
    }
    num++;
    }
    scanf("%d",&test);
    while(test--){
    scanf("%d",&n);
    printf("%d\n",a[n]);
    }
    return 0;
    }
